short_summary: The request is to acquire 6 items for various aircrafts for the Department of National Defence. The procurement will be for supply arrangement - W8485-184741 Series - Aviation Replacement Parts.
description: This request is for a supply arrangement for the Department of National Defence. Please note that only Qualified Suppliers are invited to bid on this requirement. Please submit your request to qualify as a Supplier.
full_summary:
### Aviation Replacement Parts for Various Aircrafts
#### PW-22-01016327
# Tender Details

* **Reference Number** : PW-22-01016327
* **Amendment Number** : 2
* **Solicitation Number** : W8485-237466/A

# Notice Details

* **Publication Date** : 2022-12-07
* **Tender Closing Date** : 2022-12-22 14:00:00 (Expired)
* **Amendment Date** : 2022-12-22

# Goods and Services
The Department of National Defence (DND) invites qualified contractors to submit a proposal for the supply of aviation replacement parts for various aircrafts.

* **Procurement Category** : GD
* **Notice Type** : Request for Supply Arrangement
* **Procurement Method** : Competitive - Selective Tendering

# Procurement Details

* **Trade Agreements** : Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
* **Region(s) of Opportunity** : National Capital Region (NCR)
* **Region(s) of Delivery** : Alberta, Quebec (except NCR)
* **Contracting Entity Name** : Department of National Defence

# Solicitation Requirements

* **Statement of Requirements** : The solicitation is open only to qualified holders of Supply Arrangement W8485-184741 Series.
* **Selection Criteria** : None

# Contact Information

* **Contact Name** : Ivan Khanzadeev
* **Contact Title** : Aerospace Equipment Program Management
* **Contact Email** : ivan.khanzadeev@forces.gc.ca
* **Alternate Contact** : Samantha Coles, Supply Team Leader, Public Services and Procurement Canada
* **Alternate Contact Email** : samantha.coles@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca

# Important Notes

* **Continuous Qualification Opportunity** : Suppliers can qualify for the Supply Arrangement W8485-184741 Series at any time.
* **Télétravail** : Please note that our Division is teleworking during the COVID-19 pandemic. The best way to contact us is by email.  # updated for the recent Employability Enhancement measures for Translations and Typing Practices.
